channel.title: Need moderators help
channel.description:
I created a whonix topic some time ago. Monero and telegram was working wrong http://forums.dds6qkxpwdeubwucdiaord2xgbbeyds25rbsgr73tbfpqpt4a6vjwsyd.onion/t/stream-isolation-and-some-applications/5973/5
After that I created new topic http://forums.dds6qkxpwdeubwucdiaord2xgbbeyds25rbsgr73tbfpqpt4a6vjwsyd.onion/t/my-configs-make-whonix-work-wrong/6024
http://forums.dds6qkxpwdeubwucdiaord2xgbbeyds25rbsgr73tbfpqpt4a6vjwsyd.onion//t/my-configs-make-whonix-work-wrong/6024
and there I find out what whonix config option make telegram and monero network connection crash. I typed what you should remove from whonix configs to make that apps work. Someone deleted that topic and I can't watch it now
Now I have same issue and I forgot what config I should remove. Can you take a look please

item.title: Need moderators help
item.dc:creator: Namis
item.description:
Thread is deleted forever and even mods can’t see it ?

Read full topic
